narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this Pre-License inspection. 
 
This is a 1st Pre-License Inspection for a Class  “B” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. The applicant is ready to be licensed under the AWA. 
 
The applicant is approved to house and broker farm animals, other animals, nonhuman primates Groups 1-5, small exotic 
felid and canids up to 50 lbs, and wild/exotic hoofstock. 
 
The applicant can broker only, without taking possession, bears, large exotic felids and canids. 
 
A copy of your license will be sent to you without any additional action on your part. If you have not received your license 
within 30 days, please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478.
